Slow doenload from skidrow do you no a fast one?

During the first DLC mission a infamous bug-crash that EVERYBODY in the U.S who bought a legit copy of ME3 also experiences is a crash if you watch the 2 videos in the wrong order. If you get a crash to desktop (CTD) read this thread and do what they suggest: grab the other signal-video first since watching one of the two vids causes a CTD but the other way around works. 

http://social.bioware.com/forum/1/topic/344/index/9654333/1#9655515

"Getting the other video first DOES in fact work, However, There are other 'crash locations' throughout the game, So you're not out of the woods yet! "

That comment from a U.S-ME3 owner suggests there are more spots in the game where CTD:s happend but this has nothing to do with the pirated vs legitcopy as these things are as many know general bugs and need to be patched. Luckily it seems this is the only spot so far I can find in a thread and its avoidable by grabbing the OTHER signal-video in the mission first (somewhere else on the planet).

P.S : The "2nd" (other) video signal is just 1mob-pack and 2-3 buildings away. Watch that one first, then watch the first one where it crashes to desktop (The correct video to watch is with a "pod" in it (no spoiler) .
